DOC.criteria: Females age 18 38 year ( include ) time randomisation Patients treatment gonadotrophin GnRH agonist ( long protocol ) IVF set consider appropriate accord criterion participate centre Infertility least 1 year randomisation ( except tubal infertility ) A maximum two previous consecutive unsuccessful IVF cycle ( i.e . result ongoing pregnancy 25 34 day menstruation cycle Body mass index ( BMI ) < 29 kg/m2 Any clinically significant systemic disease ( e.g. , insulin dependent diabetes ) Endocrine metabolic abnormality ( pituitary , adrenal , thyroid , pancreas , liver , kidney ) compromise participation study Any concomitant medication would interfere evaluation study medication . Specifically , nonstudy hormonal therapy ( except thyroid medication ) , prostaglandin inhibitor ( NSAIDs , include aspirin ) psychotropic agent ( phenothiazine ’ , major tranquilliser ) time study entry . Note : medication disallow study duration .
